data.eml:eml: On the spider genus Arboricaria with the description of a new species (Araneae, Gnaphosidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Mikhailov, Kirill G. (2016): On the spider genus Arboricaria with the description of a new species (Araneae, Gnaphosidae). ZooKeys 558: 153-169, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.558.6521, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.558.6521
